project1.title: Product Cards
project1.description: The project focused on building a grid of cards for a company's products.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, and Version Control with Github

project2.title: Solar System
project2.description: Use this application to learn facts about the eight planets within the solar system. When the user moves their mouse over a planet card the name will disappear and the image of the planet will appear.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery, Webpack, and Version Control with Github

project3.title: Star Destroyer
project3.description: Use this application to view the Star Destroyer Database and edit its content.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, jQuery, and Firebase

project4.title: PanAm Airlines
project4.description: Use this application as an internal system to maintain crew, airport, food services and fleet tracking for the new PanAm Airlines.
project4.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, jQuery, and Firebase

project5.title: Shark Attack
project5.description: My entire class has fallen into a pool infested with sharks and the sharks are HUNGRY and will attack soon!
project5.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, jQuery, and REACT

project6.title: Sports Roster
project6.description: I have created a NBA Greatest Roster, full of my all-time favorite players.
project6.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Bootstrap, Version Control with Github, jQuery, Firebase and REACT

project7.title: Frontend Captstone - I Got Next
project7.description: The easy to use app displays the teams, in order, of which games will be played; making it easy for users to know when they will play and who they will be playing with.

project8.title: Backend Captstone - I Got Next 2.0
project8.description: The 2.0 version includes enhancements that allow the user to view the current game, see who's next, join a team already created, and allow an administrator to make changes to the list.
project8.technologiesUsed: REACT, C#, ASP.Net, SQL Server Bootstrap, and SCSS
